casebody.data:
2002-2449 (La. 10/23/02)

Gloria SCOTT, et al. v. AMERICAN TOBACCO COMPANY, INC., et al. No. 2002-CC-2449. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 23, 2002.

In re Scott, Gloria et al; Jackson, Deanie et al.;- Plaintiff(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. K, No. 96-8461; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2002-C-1938.

*1149Granted. All proceedings stayed pending further orders of this Court.

TRAYLOR, J., recused.
